dcterms:creator: S. W. Jamison
J. P. Brereton
dcterms:description: The Rigveda is a foundational text of Vedic Sanskrit, containing hymns that are central to the study of Indo-European linguistics and cultural studies.
dcterms:title: R. GVEDA (Rigveda)

dcterms:creator: K. F. Geldner
dcterms:description: The Vedic Sanskrit Corpus provides a comprehensive collection of texts in Vedic Sanskrit, serving as a crucial resource for linguistic analysis.
dcterms:title: Vedic Sanskrit Corpus

dcterms:creator: A. A. Macdonell
dcterms:description: This dataset provides a morphological and lexical gold annotation of the Rigveda, aiding in the understanding of its grammatical structure.
dcterms:title: Morphological and Lexical Gold Annotation of the R. V

dcterms:creator: H. Hettrich
dcterms:description: An annotated corpus of Vedic Sanskrit that focuses on the case syntax of the Rigveda, providing a resource for linguistic research.
dcterms:title: Annotated Corpus of Vedic Sanskrit

dcterms:creator: O. Hellwig
dcterms:description: A stochastic lexical and POS tagger for Sanskrit, designed to assist in the morphological analysis of classical and early Vedic Sanskrit texts.
dcterms:title: Tagger for Classical Sanskrit
